snippet: Chelsea looks certain to finish outside the top four of the English Premier League for the first time in 10 years after a 2-0 home defeat by Newcastle.
abstract: Chelsea looks certain to finish outside the top four of the English Premier League for the first time in 10 years after a 2-0 home defeat by Newcastle.
lead_paragraph: Chelsea looks certain to finish outside the top four of the English Premier League for the first time in 10 years after a 2-0 home defeat by Newcastle.
